thread.title: Hollyoaks reveals a reunion for Ste Hay and John Paul McQueen | Metro News
thread.title_full: Hollyoaks reveals a reunion for Ste Hay and John Paul McQueen | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Hollyoaks reveals a reunion for Ste Hay and John Paul McQueen | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 11:58 pm (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
Sorry Starry fans, but Hollyoaks are lining up a reunion for Ste Hay and John Paul McQueen – but is there heartbreak on the horizon already as the couple prepare to give things another go? 
Harry has recently been paranoid that Ste and John Paul are falling for each other again and it turns out that his fears are founded as the exes share some highly charged moments. As Ste drifts further and further from Harry, he confides in a shocked John Paul that he thinks they are over. 
Determined to prove he can be romantic and eager to win John Paul’s heart back, Ste goes all out to recreate the moment that he proposed in a rowing boat and it seems that John Paul is both impressed and swayed by the gesture. (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
As the couple reconnect, they decide that it’s time to come clean and Ste prepares to tell Harry the truth. 
But with James Nightingale very much still on John Paul’s radar, is he as sure as Ste about giving things another try? 
And how many people are going to end up with their hearts broken? 
One to watch: Monday 20th February on E4 at 7pm.
